title: Teams: Creating a New Team
body:
Teams: Creating a New Team¶

To create a new team, follow the steps below.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Platform

  3. Click Teams

  4. Click in the upper right hand corner

  5. Enter a title

  6. Enter a team name

  7. Choose a logo

  8. Choose an administrative user

    • Assign to yourself

    • Assign to an existing account of the Maha Platform

    • Create and assign to a new account (enter a first and last name and an email)

  9. Click for each app to which you would like the new team to have access

  10. Click Save
toc: • Teams: Creating a New Team
